attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the conduct of groups involved in the Brexit campaign
attributes.additional_details:
Vote Leave fined by EC & referred to the police: https://bit.ly/2NwPu1L

Leave.EU fined by EC for multiple breaches of electoral law: https://bit.ly/2RIEy29

Leave.EU fined by ICO for unsolicited direct marketing emails & ~300,000 unsolicited communications on a single day without consent: https://bit.ly/2UnseJn & https://bit.ly/2HQyfZj

NCA investigation in Leave.EU following EC referral: https://bit.ly/2YIUVzL

Govt report into foreign influence in political campaigns: https://bit.ly/2CMeMVi
attributes.background: Criminal charges have been brought against various parties involved in the Brexit campaign. Criminal investigations are ongoing. A judge-led public enquiry into the 2016 UK EU membership referendum is necessary to help restore faith in British democracy, irrespective of how "Brexit" concludes.
